The correct answer is B: [00:03:39 - 00:04:18]. 

In this segment of the video, the on-screen guidelines appear, and the narrator instructs viewers to "look down the sights and shoot." This instruction is followed by arcade-style music and shooting sound effects. The segment runs from 00:03:39 to 00:04:18.

The correct answer is C: [00:01:52 - 00:02:44]. 

In the provided video, the zipline run into a giant mouth is shown at approximately 01:52 to 02:44 seconds. The rider can be heard joking about hoping Godzilla has fresh breath and admiring the teeth before the child asks if Godzilla is okay.
